languages.text: "Кто-то мог забыть, что Император защищает всех своих подданных. Но ты-то об этом помнишь? Помоги всем, кому можешь — это твой долг".

traits.locale_text: "Кто-то мог забыть, что Император защищает всех своих подданных. Но ты-то об этом помнишь? Помоги всем, кому можешь — это твой долг".

languages.text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."
languages.original_text: "Кто-то мог забыть, что Император защищает всех своих подданных. Но ты-то об этом помнишь? Помоги всем, кому можешь — это твой долг".

traits.locale_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely you remember? Help anyone you can — that is your duty."
"Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely you remember? Help anyone you can — that is your duty."
"Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."
"Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."
"Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."
"Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

languages.text: "Jemand anderes in Eurer Position hätte vielleicht vergessen können, dass der Imperator all seine Untertanen beschützt. Aber doch gewiss nicht Ihr. Es ist Eure Pflicht, jedem zu helfen, dem Ihr helfen könnt."
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand anderes in Eurer Position hätte vielleicht vergessen können, dass der Imperator all seine Untertanen beschützt. Aber doch gewiss nicht Ihr. Es ist Eure Pflicht, jedem zu helfen, dem Ihr helfen könnt."

languages.text: « À votre place, d'autres auraient oublié que l'Empereur protège tous ses sujets... mais pas vous, assurément. Votre devoir est d'aider tous ceux que vous pouvez. »
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, d'autres auraient oublié que l'empereur protège tous ses sujets... mais pas vous, assurément. Votre devoir est d'aider tous ceux que vous pouvez. »

languages.text: “如果换作别人处在你的位置，他可能会忘记‘帝皇庇护祂所有的臣民’这件事情。但你肯定不会忘记，因为你的职责就是尽你所能帮助别人。”
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: “如果换作别人处在你的位置，他可能会忘记‘帝皇庇护祂所有的臣民’这件事情。但你肯定不会忘记，因为你的职责就是尽你所能帮助别人。”

languages.text: 「他の者がお前の立場にあれば、皇帝陛下がすべての臣民をお守りくださっていることを忘れてしまうかもしれない。しかし、お前は違う。誰であろうと助けるのがお前の義務だ」
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: 「他の者がお前の立場にあれば、皇帝陛下がすべての臣民をお守りくださっていることを忘れてしまうかもしれない。しかし、お前は違う。誰であろうと助けるのがお前の義務だ」

languages.text: «Otro en su posición podría haber olvidado que el Emperador protege a todos sus súbditos. Pero usted no. Es su deber ayudar a todo el que pueda».
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: «Otro en su posición podría haber olvidado que el Emperador protege a todos sus súbditos. Pero usted no. Es su deber ayudar a todo el que pueda».

languages.text: "Yerinde başkası olsa İmparator'un tüm tebaasını koruduğunu unutabilir ama sen unutmazsın, biliyorum. Herkese elinden geldiğince yardım etmek görevin."
languages.original_text: "Another in your position could have forgotten that the Emperor protects all of His subjects. But surely not you. It is your duty to help anyone you can."

traits.locale_text: "Yerinde başkası olsa İmparator'un tüm tebaasını koruduğunu unutabilir ama senin unutmayacağını biliyorum. Herkese elinden geldiğince yardım etmek görevin."
